Package System

Class DrawingSurface

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
System.DrawingSurface
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants, ScreenSwitcher
public class DrawingSurface extends processing.core.PApplet implements ScreenSwitcher
This class chooses which screen is currently shown and also changes the insides of the window depending on the size
Author:
Noah Pien and Kartik Joshi Credits to John Shelby for part of code
